answerText: People's Republic of China [or Zhonghua Renmin Gongheguo][10] In the Mahabharata, this princess becomes the wife of all five of the Pandavas.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Virginia + Dartmouth | 20 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: For 10 points each, answer the following about Asian epics. [10] Each of 108 bandits is fully character-developed in Water Margin, one of the four Great Classical epic novels from this country.
